name: Confessions (Peace & Love Games)
description:
Write or Read
  • Write down what burdens you and send it into the aether. 
  • Read confessions by other people.

That's it!

Confessions is a free interactive art installation. 
All confessions are as anonym as you want them to be.

IMPORTANT!

Currently only the writing section is activated to gather more confessions ahead of launch. I can't launch the game without confessions. ^^ 

So thanks ahead for everyone confessing. <3
